definition: secondary normal school (secondary school that trains kindergarten and elementary school teachers)
pinyin: zhong1 deng3 shi1 fan4 xue2 xiao4
zhong1 deng3 ji4 shu4 xue2 xiao4

pinyin: wu3 qi1 gan4 bu4 xue2 xiao4
Qie1 te4 hao2 si1 xue2 xiao4
Ban4 dao3 Guo2 ji4 Xue2 xiao4

definition: Chungnam National University, Daejeon, South Korea
vocational high school/abbr. to 技校[ji4 xiao4]
vocational high school/abbr. to 技校[ji4 xiao4]

sentences.english: The educational aim of Huijia School is to "be a great Chinese".
sentences.chinese: 汇佳学校的培养目标是“做一个伟大的中国人”。

sentences.english: Many schools around the country have adopted similar coursework.
sentences.chinese: 全国许多学校创立了相似的课程。

sentences.english: Soon he became the top student at school.
sentences.chinese: 很快他便成了学校里的尖子生。

sentences.english: My high school was Punahou School in Honolulu, Hawai'i.
sentences.chinese: 我高中是在夏威夷州火奴鲁鲁市普纳荷学校读的。

sentences.english: Factor in all the schools you’re applying to and any back-up options.
sentences.chinese: 考虑你所有申请的学校和后备选择。

sentences.english: The languages were severely suppressed in education by the Japanese government.
sentences.chinese: 日本政府严格限制了琉球语在学校的教学和使用。

sentences.english: The state of our inner-city schools is a case in point.
sentences.chinese: 我们内城区学校的状况就是一个恰当的例子。

sentences.english: Teachers in schools have been rubbished for the last ten years.
sentences.chinese: 过去十年学校教师一直受抨击。

sentences.english: Few friends has she made since she came into this school last year.
sentences.chinese: 自从去年她来到这个学校，没交几个朋友。

sentences.english: Do we think they are behaving themselves at school?
sentences.chinese: 我们会认为这些学生在学校一直是规规矩矩的吗？

sentences.english: Seldon the Master of Wellington College, one of the most prestigeous schools in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 威灵顿公学是英国最受尊重的学校之一。

sentences.english: And it is this belief that leads us to include these arts in the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 正是这个观点，我们将艺术襄括进了学校课程之中。

sentences.english: The school board members spend their time disputing and getting nothing done.
sentences.chinese: 学校董事们争论不休，但一事无成。

sentences.english: When you go to a new school, you don't know the ground rules of how you are supposed to behave.
sentences.chinese: 当你进入一所新学校，常常不知道有何遵循的规矩。

sentences.english: I am learning modern dance in school.
Testing plays an important part in university's teaching and quality administration.
sentences.chinese: 考试是高等学校教学管理和质量管理的重要内容之一。

definition: the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
the school (as a party in a contract, dispute etc)/the school authorities
to pass brilliantly (used in congratulatory fashion)
senior high school/abbr. for 高級中學|高级中学[gao1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
teacher in charge of a class
junior high school/abbr. for 初級中學|初级中学[chu1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
to go to school/to attend school
